output: md_document

```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(magrittr)
dir <- list.dirs(recursive = FALSE)

yaml <- 
  lapply(file.path(dir, "index.Rmd"),
         readLines) %>%
  lapply(function(x){
    yaml_matter <- which(grepl("^---", x))
    x[-c(1, yaml_matter[2]:length(x))]
  }) 

title <- 
  vapply(yaml,
         function(x){
           x[grepl("^title", x)]
         },
         FUN.VALUE = character(1)) %>%
  sub("^title[:]", "", .) %>%
  gsub("\"", "", .) %>%
  trimws()

date <- sub("personal_blog[/]", "", dir)

link <- sprintf("<a href = '%s'><h3>%s</h3></a>",
                file.path(dir, "index.md"),
                title)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
paste0(link, collapse = "<br/><br/>") %>%
  cat()
```
